text: Arau tomalokara majata yisakale strai thai mrtyubarana karae, sihamte (straisakale) carai maha daha dina apeksa karaiba. Tara pichata yetiya sihamte nijara iddatakala purna karaiba, tetiya bidhi mutabika nijara babe yi karaiba tata tomalokara kono papa na'i; arau tomaloke yi karaa se'i bisaye allaha samyaka aragata
